byline.original: By CLAYTON P. GILLETTE and DAVID A. SKEEL Jr

abstract: Op-Ed article by Clayton P Gillette and David A Skeel Jr calls on Congress to extend to Puerto Rico power to authorize municipalities to file for bankruptcy, which will enable territory to implement Gov Alejandro Garcia Padilla's proposal to fix its finances; underscores necessity of giving Puerto Rico's government enough leverage over creditors to halt island's downward spiral.
lead_paragraph: Bankruptcy should be allowed for the island’s municipalities.

headline.main: How Congress Can Help Puerto Rico
headline.print_headline: How Congress Can Help Puerto Rico

snippet: Bankruptcy should be allowed for the island’s municipalities.
